TopicTitle: O.K.A.D. releases secondary engine mount and Blinder missile package

Articles.Content: Omni Korp Aerospace Director Tsu Suun Boom authorized shipment of both the new Secondary Engine Mount parts and the Blinder missile package. The SEMs can be used to add auxiliary 1m liquid fuel engines to any size rocket although it is not compatible with certain oversized main engines. The Blinder missile package includes all parts necessary to build and launch your own Blinder missiles complete with High Impact Flare warhead.
